sentences.en: A fur coat has more utility in winter than in autumn.
sentences.cn: 毛皮外衣在冬天比在秋天更有用.

sentences.cn: 其效用是保证二氧化硫排放在许可排放量所允许的范围之内.

sentences.en: As production increased, the utility cost could go up too.
sentences.cn: 随着生产的增加, 其公用事业费也将上升.

sentences.en: Belief in the utility of higher education is shared by students nationwide.
sentences.cn: 全国的学生都相信高等教育是有用的。

sentences.en: Even the survey's most rabid critics acknowledge the utility of this kind of data.
sentences.cn: 连该调查最狂热的批评者也承认这类数据的用处.

sentences.en: He inwardly questioned the utility of his work.
sentences.cn: 他内心质疑自己的工作是否有用。

sentences.en: I am a beauty - merchant , a trader in song, and I pursue utility.
sentences.cn: 我是个贩卖美的商人 、 推销歌曲的贾客.我追求的是实效.

sentences.en: It is a suspension bridge that is the nonesuch of beauty and utility.
sentences.cn: 这是一座成为美观和实用典范的吊桥。

sentences.en: It is the purpose of soliciting funds from utility employees.
sentences.cn: 目的是向公司的雇员募捐.

sentences.en: It’s a simple shareware utility that allows you to print signs and banners.
sentences.cn: 这是个简单的共享应用软件，你可以用它来打印标牌和横幅。

sentences.en: Not so long ago utility bills didn't amount to much.
sentences.cn: 没多久以前,用于公用事业的费用很有限.

sentences.en: Short for binder utility, an operating - system program that performs binding.
sentences.cn: 联编实用程序的简称, 是一种能够实现联接和编辑的操作系统 级 的程序.

sentences.en: So was property and public utility.
sentences.cn: 产业和公用事业也属于他们.

sentences.en: They urged reduced utility rates for hard - pressed residential users.
sentences.cn: 他们强烈要求对经济困难的居民用户降低电力煤气价格.

sentences.en: This does not, however, detract from the utility of the terms.
sentences.cn: 但这并不妨碍使用这些术语.

sentences.en: This ware is suitable for decorative purpose but unsuitable for utility.
